cause.description:
We have seen too many instances of suicide, depression, alcoholism and drug addictions because girls have such a low self-esteem.
We want nothing more than to see girls feeling great about who they are and what their place in the world is.
1. Every single person on this earth is incredible.
2. Self respect is the most powerful tool.
3. YOU are incredible!
cause.mission: give teenage girls a better idea of how amazing they are!
cause.name: Happy in Your Own Skin
